definition: to protect/to defend/to guard against/to prevent

sentences.english: The contradiction between flood control and profit is getting increasingly serious as industry and agriculture develop.
sentences.chinese: 随着工农业的发展，水库防洪与兴利矛盾日益突出。

sentences.english: This is related to flood-control tests.
sentences.chinese: 这与防洪控制测试也是相关的。

sentences.english: Ships were ordered back to port and relief workers reinforced coastal defenses.
sentences.chinese: 船只已被命令回港，同时救援人员也在加强沿海防洪。

sentences.english: The random simulation of flood hydrographs is a new way for hydrological safety design.
sentences.chinese: 洪水随机模拟是防洪安全设计的新途径。

sentences.english: Flood diversion and storage areas are very important to flood control.
sentences.chinese: 分蓄洪区是平原防洪的一种重要措施。

sentences.english: The flood control headquarters has urged local governments to step up efforts to fight the floods.
sentences.chinese: 防洪抗旱总指挥部办公室号召当地政府全力抗洪。

sentences.english: They fortressed the town against the anticipated flood.
sentences.chinese: 他们加强了那座城市的防洪设施。

sentences.english: Breaks in the city's levee system flooded 80 percent of the city with water.
sentences.chinese: 城市防洪堤系统的破坏让水淹没了整个城市的80%。

sentences.english: Article 81 Activities for flood control shall be conducted in accordance with the provisions in the Flood Control Law.
sentences.chinese: 第八十一条从事防洪活动，依照防洪法的规定执行。

sentences.english: Article 81 Activities for flood control shall be conducted in accordance with the provisions in the Flood Control Law.
sentences.chinese: 第八十一条从事防洪活动，依照防洪法的规定执行。

sentences.english: The government is planning to build a dam here.
sentences.chinese: 当局筹算在这搭建一座防洪坝。

sentences.english: Based on the scheduling principle of Dahuofang reservoir, we set up an integrated flood regulation system in Hun basin.
sentences.chinese: 建立了以大伙房水库为中心的浑河流域防洪调度系统。

sentences.english: So how high would we have to pile the sandbags?
sentences.chinese: 那么我们需要垒叠多高的沙包防洪呢？

sentences.english: Some 287,000 soldiers have been called into flood-prevention work.
sentences.chinese: 28万7千名武警战士已经投入到防洪抢险的最前线。

sentences.english: Defining compensation scope of flood plain areas in lower reaches of the Yellow River;
sentences.chinese: 黄河下游滩区生产堤对防洪造成了一定影响。

sentences.english: Second, the influence of the discharge variation on flood control of Jingjiang River and Dongting Lake is described in the following aspects: 1.
sentences.chinese: 其次全面论述了这种变化对荆江与洞庭湖防洪的影响。

definition: to pilot a ship/to channel water/to draw water (for irrigation)
